title: Android 11 Bubbles Compatibility
content:
So, I understand that Buubbles feature must be supported by each specific app.
Here's what I found so far:


1. MESSAGES: I am given the possibility to choose Bubbles and it works


2. WHATSAPP: I am given the possibility to choose Bubbles but id does not work >>> WHY?!?!


3. MESSEMNGER: I am not given the possibility to choose Bubbles
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
